name: Avoid Forms with a very low comment/code ratio
description:
Forms should have at least a ratio comment/code > X %
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Forms with comment/code ratio lower than X %
It provides the following information: Form full name, comment/code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact
